root.name: beatmania CORE REMIX
root.description: SonglistNew Songs[BREAK BEATS] remixed by SLAKE - 2 gorgeous 4U -EMULATE MIX- [HOUSE] remixed by TATSUYA NISHIWAKI - 20,november -FINAL EDIT- [LATIN HOUSE] remixed by SLAKE - Acid Bomb -LATINIZE MIX- [HIPHOP] B.BANDJ - ACROSS THE BOARDERS [RAVE] RAM - alienhead [HIPHOP] B.BANDJ - ANALYZE [TECHNO] remixed by QUADRA - Beginning of Life -THE GROUND PULSE MIX- [DRUM'N BASS MIX] remixed by QUADRA - Deep Clear Eyes -THE BLEEPING UP MIX- [SOUL] remixed by TATSUYA NISHIWAKI - Do you love me? -FINAL EDIT- [TRANCE] remixed by dj TAKA - e-motion -ROMANTIC STYLE- [BREAK BEATS] remixed by SLAKE feat. R.C. - greed eater -DEAL WITH IT MIX- [RB] ASLETICS - it's so good [REGGAE] remixed by good-cool - jam jam reggae -JAM JAM MIX- [J-SOUL] youhei - KOUYOU [EXPERIMENTAL] remixed by DJ SIMON - LOVE SO GROOVY -SLEEP MIX- [CROSSOVER] remixed by YUKIHIRO FUKUTOMI - love's theme of beatmania [TECHNO] remixed by SLAKE - OVERDOSER -FLOTAGE MIX- [MIXTURE] ASLETICS - rock the beatz [SKACORE] remixed by KEN MATSUMOTO - SKA a go go -SKACORE MIX- [HARDCORE DRUM'N BASS] RAM - something special [BIG BEAT] remixed by dj nagureo - STAY WITH ME -BIGBEAT MIX- [FUTURE JAZZ] remixed by Tomosuke - u gotta groove -FUTURE LATIN MIX- Revival Songs[BREAK-BTS] prophet-31 - 2 gorgeous 4U [HOUSE] dj nagureo - 20,november (single mix) [HOUSE] dj nagureo - 20,november (radio edit) [HARD TEKNO] DJ FX - Acid Bomb [TECHNO] QUADRA - Beginning of Life [DRUM'N BASS] QUADRA - DEEP CLEAR EYES [SOUL] reo-nagumo - Do you love me? [RAVE] e.o.s. - e-motion (2nd mix) [BREAK-BTS] The Dust Fathers - greed eater [REGGAE] jam master '73 - jam jam reggae [SOUL] LOVEMINTS - LOVE SO GROOVY [TECHNO] MIRAK - OVERDOSER (Ambient Mix) [TECHNO] MIRAK - OVERDOSER (romo mix) [KONAMIX] NITE SYSTEM - Salamander Beat Crush mix [SKA] THE BALD HEADS - SKA a go go [HIPHOP] dj nagureo - u gotta groove
